text: I've managed to get it functioning previously, but in an extremely hacky way that involved manually setting the height for the element for which the background existed and having to do a test check with every height change :neutral_face: . Fortunately, the client is fine with the background-color.

Ah gotcha! I did a bit of digging on my side too and confirmed that we've managed to get similar hacks in place but the impact of them was that it fully broke the mobile responsiveness of the email so we felt that responsiveness was more important than background image in a small few inbox providers, but let me know if you have any thoughts on it :+1:
